dialogues.text: Oliver and Alice join the two old ladies and go through, doorway of Irena's apartment.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Alice and Oliver step into the apartment, Alice gets o look at the room and turns away.  Oliver takes her in his arms, trying to hide the room from her. Over the scene is sound of the phonograph record still revolving with a monotonous, grinding sound. REVERSE SHOT of the apartment as Alice and Oliver see it. room bears the signs of a terrific struggle. Furniture is overturned, ornaments smashed, the draperies and pictures torn down. Judd's body is hidden by a chair. Only his leg one pants leg torn, can be seen. O.S. is the sound of the record revolving.                                   ' The two old ladies push into the room. They seem quite pleased at all the excitement.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to  Oliver) You needn't worry, Mr. Reed, Sue Ellen and I phoned the police   Just as  soon as we heard the racket.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oliver speaks almost automatically as he starts to look i the  other rooms.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The  second old lady stoops  and starts to pick something up.    The first  old lady stops her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sue-Ellen! You know better than that. You're not supposed to  touch anything until the police get here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But it's  all blood.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She points down. INSERT THE BROKEN SWORD CANE  in Judd's hand. BACK TO SCENE.    Alice and Oliver have  joined the two o ladies and are looking down  at the broken sword.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We've got to help her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (thoughtfully)  She never lied to us.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (taking his arm)  Come on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They slip out of the room together.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alice and Oliver come down the steps, and they start to r through the foggy night.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Irena starts down the promenade. A white ground fog lies heavily upon the earth. She pauses for a moment.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Irena comes up to the cage of the black panther. The pant rises and looks at her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: REVERSE SHOT - as the panther in the f.g. looks out betwe the bars at Irena.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Irena opens the gate, reaches in her purse and finds the She goes up to the lock in the cage and fits the key in t lock, turning it.  She pauses a moment and then swings op the cage door. CLOSEUP of the panther, doorway. It is crouched, in the open REVERSE SHOT of Irena. She is standing facing the panther Her head is up; her arms hang at her side, her hands spre out. Her eyes are wide open. MED. SHOT of Irena and the panther. The beast snarls once leaps forward. With one sweep of a heavy paw the animal h Irena to the ground. Free, he bounds off into the darknes CLOSE SHOT of Irena. There is a little smile on her lips. coat has fallen back from a naked shoulder. A piece of th broken blade of Judd's dagger protrudes from a bloodless wound in the shoulder. A thin trickle of blood flows from corner of her mouth. She scrabbles with her fingers again the hard pavement. Then her fingers relax. She is dead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The panther leaps up on the wall and pauses, then leaps, down, bounding across the avenue.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SHOT of a taxicab speeding along through the fog, with headlights glaring.  Suddenly there is a scream of brakes impact, a startling scream.  The cab pulls to a stop, alm beside the avenue, and the driver gets out. A policeman j him.  They start running back. CLOSE SHOT of the dead panther of the policeman's flashli We see it in the beam

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oliver and Alice come to a little space before the cage. see a black object lying on the pavement.  Quietly and cautiously they cross over to it.  Oliver bends down to examine it. Under Irena's fur coat is a black leopard's b the leg and paw in the same attitude her arm and hand had taken, and the broken blade that had once protruded from Irena's gleaming shoulder is now rooted in the black fur the panther.   Oliver looks up at Alice, then gets to his feet, takes he arm, and they start to the walk.  Some few foot away, the turn back to look again at the body.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (softly ) Poor Irena.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They turn off and walk away, arm in arm.  They are lost t view in the foggy luminosity under a street lamp.
